entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h early this evening then light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 4:43 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the morning then steady. Forecast issued 4:43 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:43 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
